com.vmware.vapi.vmc.client.authz

Class AuthzRefreshingRequestExecutorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.vmc.client.authz.AuthzRefreshingRequestExecutorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.protocol.client.rest.RequestExecutorFactory

    public final class AuthzRefreshingRequestExecutorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.vmware.vapi.internal.protocol.client.rest.RequestExecutorFactory
    Creates RequestExecutor instances that implement the authorization flow for accessing VMC's API:
    1. Get an access authorization if there is none set previously.
    2. Perform the invocation.
    3. If status code of the response is 401, refresh the access authorization and retry the invocation.
